scripts.build: npm run build:deps && npm run build:components
scripts.build:deps: npm run build -w @headless/core && cp -f ../../libs/core/dist/cdn/core.js ./dist/core.js && cp -f ../../libs/core/dist/cdn/core.js.map ./dist/core.js.map && npm run build -w @headless/interop && cp -f ../../libs/interop/dist/cdn/interop.js ./dist/interop.js && cp -f ../../libs/interop/dist/cdn/interop.js.map ./dist/interop.js.map
